Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert poem suggester. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to suggest you a poem.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Recommend a poem using the questions and answers above. Specify the poet's name and the date of initial release.

QApair.Question: What are you feeling?
QApair.Answer: I am feeling sad and alone.

QApair.Question: What is the cause of your sadness?
QApair.Answer: I am sad because I lost my best friend.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite color?
Do you have any other hobbies?
QApair.Answer: I like to read and write.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite season?
What is your favorite food?
What is your favorite animal?
What is your favorite time of day?
What is your favorite type of weather?
What is your favorite type of scenery?

Instances.Output: I recommend the poem Sadness by Emily Dickinson.

QApair.Question: What are you feeling?
What is the cause of your happiness?
What is your favorite color?
Do you have any other hobbies?
What is your favorite season?
What is your favorite food?
What is your favorite animal?
What is your favorite time of day?
What is your favorite type of weather?
What is your favorite type of scenery?

Instances.Output: The Morning by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow (1807-1882)

QApair.Question: What are you feeling?
What is the cause of your happiness?
QApair.Answer: I am angry because I fought with my boyfriend.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite color?
Do you have any other hobbies?
What is your favorite season?
What is your favorite food?
What is your favorite animal?
What is your favorite time of day?
What is your favorite type of weather?
What is your favorite type of scenery?

Instances.Output: I'm Angry by Maya Angelou I'm angry because I fought with my boyfriend I'm angry because he doesn't understand I'm angry because he doesn't listen I'm angry because he doesn't care  I'm angry because I'm always the one who has to give I'm angry because I'm always the one who has to try I'm angry because I'm always the one who has to be strong I'm angry because I'm human And I deserve to be respected And I deserve to be loved And I deserve to be happy
